additional.message_body:
You may proceed with the lawsuit and I will see you in court to settle this dispute.  I specifically asked you to validate this debit and for some reason you refuse to let me know all of the information which is relevant.  
     Have a wonderful day.  I will file my answer with the courts.  
      Thank you

Case ID: [financial_data]

 

We are representing [organization_name]. A Parental payday Loan company which owns and operates more than 350 online cash websites.

 Loan Amount:[financial_data]

Total Outstanding Balance (Due Amount): [financial_data] (Including Late Fee, Penalty, Affidavit Charges and Rate of Interest Charges.)

 

One Time Settlement Offer:                               

1: [financial_data] (if paid Today).

 


Consequences (Further Legal Steps):  

1: Lawsuit Filed Under Several Sections.  

2: Your Employer Will Be Informed.

3: Credit Bureaus Will Be Notified So That It Could Be Reported To Your Credit.

4: References Will Be Informed.

5: A Day in Court.

6: Garnishment of Your Paycheck.

 

Mode of payment:




[financial_data]

[financial_data]




 

 


Let us know whether you opt for a one time settlement or payment arrangement for the whole amount so that the account can be updated.

 Since this loan account is very past due so we would appreciate it if you give this matter your earliest attention as this account has to be updated on an urgent basis to avoid legal action.

 For any queries or concerns, you can contact us.

 Regards.

 Manager.

[organization_name].

Dear [personal_name],




We have sent you several reminders about this Unpaid Loan Account.


This is the last opportunity to close this account,otherwise we will file a Civil Case on your name.


Do revert with your final intentions ASAP.




Thanks & Regards,




Debt Recovery Department
Hi Jaqulline.  I need you to please validate the debt.  You may mail the documents to this email ty
